Easy Docs

What is Easy Docs?

Easy Docs is a simple and modern documentation management app built using Fumadocs and Next.js. It helps developers create and manage documentation with ease.

Features

  • MDX support for rich documentation content.
  • Powerful layout and UI components from Fumadocs.
  • Responsive design and custom styles.

Getting Started

To set up Easy Docs locally, follow these steps:

Clone the repositoryUse git clone to copy the project to your local machine.
Install dependenciesRun npm install to install required packages.
Start the development serverUse npm run dev to launch the app locally.

Learn More

For more details about Fumadocs and Next.js, visit the following links:

  • Fumadocs Documentation
  • Next.js Documentation
